alert.note: Alert for Eastern Kiowa County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 7:31PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Prowers and southeastern Kiowa Counties through 815 PM MDT... At 731 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles south of Brandon, or 18 miles northeast of Lamar, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sheridan Lake and Brandon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Kiowa County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County
